coverEntrance: You'll find your game stats here. Tap to view and share.
coverShare: We can't thank you enough for making Arena of Valor what it is today! To show our appreciation, whenever you share your battle stats on Facebook, you'll receive a  reward! Also don't forget to log in for Swag Sunday on July 29th—great rewards await you!
coverSlogan: 大数据分享开始啦，快来查看
shareThanking: We can't thank you enough for making Arena of Valor what it is today! To show our appreciation, whenever you share your battle stats on Facebook, you'll receive a token you can cash in on 7/29 for an awesome reward! So don't forget to log in for Swag Sunday on July 29th—great rewards await you!
flgLike: Log in to your game account to like your friend’s share.
tipsNonHornor: Come join the fight. You are the next MVP!
tipsWrongArea: you don't have account in this server, can't login
tipsLag: Network delay, please close the page to try again or refresh
tipsTime: This event's statistics are by the end of 2018/6/30, account registered after 6/60 has no data,we will have more events in future, please look forward to it.
tipsExpired: 活动已结束，请期待下一次活动
code-997: 活动已结束，请期待下一次活动
